cause.description:
Across The US, Thousands of Schools are closing down their various preforming arts programs because they are at a loss of money. Save The Arts! is going to try to do as much as possible to stop this from happening. The Arts is an important element in education, and should be treated as such.
1. The Arts is sometimes the Only Outlet kids have to express themselves.
2. Its Proven, That children in the Arts have a higher score on their SAT's that those who have no Art-related background.
cause.name: Save The Arts!
